title: Magnetic soft organogel supercapacitor electrolyte for energy storage
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00317A, Communication
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Xinxian Ma, Jiuzhi Wei, Yuehua Liang, Juan Zhang, Enke Feng, Zhenxing Fu, Xinning Han
A magnetic organogel exhibits excellent mechanical properties. This preparation approach provides new ideas for designing highly magnetic organogel electrolytes with excellent electrochemical properties.
